message:
i was looking for if it's possible to host a node app on a shared hosting, and i found those topics on stackoverflow and other websites saying that it's possible, my question is there anyone here really tried to do so before ?

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/24777750/how-to-host-a-node-js-application-in-shared-hosting

http://vinyll.scopyleft.fr/installing-a-custom-version-of-node-on-a-shared-hosting/
story: Ibrahim Mohammed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: How to host a Node.Js application in shared hosting
caption: stackoverflow.com
description: How to host a Node.Js application in shared hosting I want to host a node.js application in shared hosting. Does anyone have any reference or documentation to refer to. thanks in advance
